articles.description: Asin is back on Instagram and the actress shared pictures from her daughter, Arin's sixth birthday. The actress with her husband Rahul Sharma is in Paris for the little ones' birthday.
articles.content: Asin is back on Instagram and the actress gave a glimpse of her daughter, Arin's sixth birthday celebrations in Paris. The 'Ghajini' actress has been away from social media and her Instagram posts ar… [+1347 chars]

articles.author: Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Kangana Ranaut fumbles as she fires arrow at Delhi’s Dussehra celebration, fans recall when she compared herself to Tom Cruise. Watch - The Indian Express
articles.description: Videos of Kangana Ranaut attempting to fire an arrow in the direction of a Ravan effigy have been doing the rounds online. The actor participated in Delhi's Ramleela celebrations on Dussehra, emerging as the first woman to set Ravan effigy afire.
articles.content: Actor Kangana Ranaut became the first woman in the history of Delhi’s Lav Kush Ramleela to perform the Ravan Dahan on Dussehra, but her experience was marred by multiple attempts to shoot an arrow in… [+2008 chars]
